main_definition: Carl is a common given name or an abbreviation of Carlton, but it can also be used as a slang term in certain contexts.

meanings_and_examples.example: My friend's name is Carl and he loves playing basketball.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Short form of the name Carlton, often used in informal settings or as a nickname
meanings_and_examples.example: I met my cousin at his place called 'Carlton Avenue.'

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used sarcastically to refer to someone who is perceived as lacking common sense or intelligence
meanings_and_examples.example: Don't listen to that guy, he thinks he's smart but I call him Carl because he's pretty dense.
